recipe.title: Dark Chocolate Chip Banana "Ice Cream" Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 3 ; bananas, cut into coins and frozen
½ cup ; dark chocolate chips ; (90 g)
¼ cup ; milk, of choice ; (60 mL)

steps.step: Cut bananas into coins and place in freezer in a sealable bag. Freeze overnight or until solid.
Place all ingredients into a food processor or blender and blend until smooth.
Pour contents into a loaf or small pan.
Freeze one hour or until solid.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Cut bananas into coins and place in freezer in a sealable bag.
Place all ingredients into a food processor or blender and blend until smooth.
Pour contents into a loaf or small pan.
Freeze one hour or until solid.
